track.name: Algorithms
track.descriptions: The true test of problem solving: when one realizes that time and memory aren't infinite.

primary_contest.description:
Sign up for 101 Hack 38, an algorithm contest that’s all about speed, accuracy and efficiency. 

Beginning Monday, June 20th, you’ll have 120 minutes to solve 5 challenges. Top 10 coders win HackerRank T-shirts. Get your code on and sign up now!
primary_contest.name: 101 Hack June 2016

model.preview: You're given a weighted tree. Let's construct a complete graph: capacity of edge (u, v) is distance between u and v in tree. Find maximum flow in this graph.
model.name: Tree Flow
